summary: An archeologist discovers his daughter is possessed by the spirit of an Egyptian queen. To save mankind he must destroy her.
cast: Charlton Heston|Susannah York|Jill Townsend|Stephanie Zimbalist|Patrick Drury|Bruce Myers|Nadim Sawalha|Ian McDiarmid|Ahmed Osman|Miriam Margolyes|Michael Mellinger|Leonard Maguire|Ishia Bennison|Madhav Sharma|Michael Halphie|Christopher Fairbank|Roger Kemp|Albert Moses
title: El despertar
